titleStmt.title: An arrant thiefe, vvhom euery man may trust in vvord and deed, exceeding true and iust. With a comparison betweene a thiefe and a booke. Written by Iohn Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw: All-de, for Henry Gosson, and are to bee solde in Panier-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
